original_text: “Woe to you experts in the law, because you have taken away the key to knowledge. You yourselves have not entered, and you have hindered those who were entering.”
korean_text: 화 있을진저 너희 율법교사여 너희가 지식의 열쇠를 가져가서 너희도 들어가지 않고 또 들어가고자 하는 자도 막았느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: "Woe to you experts in the law
because you have taken away the key to knowledge
and you have hindered those who were entering
